name: PillMaster
0:
”Alexa open Pill Master”
”Alexa tell Pill Master pills taken”
”Alexa ask Pill Master about skill”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pill master
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pill Master skill interacts with the Pill Master (Echo) app with this skill you can turn off pill alerts in the app, it tells you what pills you need to take and when to take them, what pills you took last, how many pills you have left and will also notify you when you need a repeat prescription.

To use this skill you will need to purchase the full version of the Pill Master (Echo) app, the app can be installed from Google Play Store for free then you can purchase the full version within the app.
